title: Canon wants us to pay for using our own camera as a webcam
author: romanzipp
aiHeadline: Breaking News: Canon is being super generous and only asking you to pay extra to use your own camera as a webcam, because who needs free features when you've already spent $6299 on a fancy camera, and now they're basically holding your webcam functionality hostage, wow what a great business model!

title: Supreme Court upholds TikTok ban, but Trump might offer lifeline
author: kjhughes
aiHeadline: In a shocking turn of events, the Supreme Court has upheld the TikTok ban, but don't worry, Trump is here to save the day, or at least that's what we're led to believe, with a potential lifeline that will probably come with its own set of strings attached, because that's just how politics works, right?

title: Thoughts on a Month with Devin
author: swyx
aiHeadline: Get ready for a thrilling read about someone's thoughts on a whole month with Devin, because who doesn't love a good month-long reflection on their experiences, and I'm sure it's not just a bunch of mundane details that you'll struggle to stay awake through, but rather a riveting tale of adventure and excitement, or maybe not

title: Investigating an "Evil" RJ45 Dongle
author: zdw
aiHeadline: Investigating an 'Evil' RJ45 Dongle: because who doesn't love a good mystery, especially when it involves a possibly malicious USB device that's just waiting to ruin your day, and our intrepid investigator is on the case, delving into the dark world of potentially evil tech gadgets, stay tuned for the thrilling conclusion

title: Brood War Korean Translations
author: todsacerdoti
aiHeadline: For all you Brood War fans out there, get excited, because someone has taken the time to translate the Korean parts of the game, and now you can finally understand what's going on, or at least that's the theory, assuming you're still playing this game from the Stone Age of gaming, and you're not just nostalgic for the good old days when graphics were bad and gameplay was clunky
